nodes.text: Space barnacles were spaceborne barnacles who, like ant-flies, stuck and clinged to surfaces like blemishes.

Space barnacles were first mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical. They were later made canonical with the publishing of Musings of an Ithorian on Hyperspace.
